title: Cabinet: Scheduling Automation Tool
content:
Executive calendar management for all

A scheduling automation platform built for modern EAs (and people who need an EA) to help juggle busy executives calendars

Meet the assistant’s assistant

Take the stress out of scheduling. Enhance your workflow with the latest automation tools while maintaining the human touch.
